name: WorldHeadlines
0:
”Alexa, Open World Headlines”
”Alexa, Ask World Headlines to give news from India”
”Alexa, Ask World Headlines to give news from United States”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: world headlines
des:
This conversational skill will provide latest news from multiple countries based on user selection. You can get news from countries like India, United States and United Kingdom. Each country will have multiple news sources you can choose from. India will have The Hindu and Times of India, United States will have CNN, New York Times, etc.
United Kingdom will have news from BBC, Telegraph, etc.

 Additional countries and news sources will be added to the skill in the future.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
